item.title: 欧盟期待大科技公司和有影响力的人打击混合威胁和假新闻
item.description: 由于对外国政府干预国家选举的担忧，欧盟委员会周三提出了一项战略，欧洲正寻求网络平台和有影响力的人帮助打击虚假信息和促进民主。【原文：Europe is looking to online platforms and influencers to help fight disinformation and promote democracy according to a European Commission strategy presented on Wednesday amid concerns over interference by foreign governments in national elections.】

item.title: Polestar计划反向拆股，以保持纳斯达克上市地位，因为亏损不断增加
item.description: Polestar 周三表示，公司将进行反向拆股，即减少现有股票数量，同时增加股票价值，因为这家亏损的电动汽车制造商正努力保住在纳斯达克的上市地位。【原文：Polestar said on Wednesday it would conduct a reverse stock split - reducing the number of its existing shares while increasing their value - as the loss-making electric vehicle maker strives to retain its Nasdaq listing.】

item.title: Teradar 瞄准 200 亿美元市场，为自动驾驶汽车提供更便宜的全天候传感器
item.description: Teradar 公司周三表示，该公司筹集了 1.5 亿美元，并发布了一种新型 "太赫兹视觉 "传感器，称这种传感器可以使全天候、高分辨率的传感变得更便宜、更耐用，从而颠覆汽车雷达和激光雷达市场。【原文：Teradar on Wednesday said it raised $150 million and unveiled a new "terahertz-vision" sensor that it says could disrupt the automotive radar and lidar market by making all-weather, high-resolution sensing cheaper and more durable.】

item.title: 早间竞标：科技动荡与数据洪流
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 稳定币增长，Circle 季度收入大增
item.description: 本周三，Circle 公司报告称，由于稳定币发行量增加，其旗舰产品 USDC 的储备金收入也随之增加，第三季度收入猛增了 66%。【原文：Circle reported a 66% jump in third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, on the back of higher reserve income through its flagship USDC as stablecoin circulation increased.】

item.title: 美国股市期货上涨，投资者欢呼联邦关门可能结束
item.description: 华尔街期货周三走高，原因是投资者对美国政府可能结束历时最长的停摆感到高兴，同时，先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）乐观的盈利前景重燃了对人工智能的乐观情绪。【原文：Wall Street futures ticked higher on Wednesday as investors cheered a possible end to the longest U.S. government shutdown, while an upbeat earnings outlook from Advanced Micro Devices revived optimism around AI.】

item.title: 自动驾驶卡车公司 Einride 将通过 SPAC 交易上市，估值 18 亿美元
item.description: 瑞典自动驾驶卡车公司 Einride 周三表示，已同意通过与空白支票公司 Legato Merger Corp III 合并的方式在美国上市，交易估值为 18 亿美元。【原文：Swedish autonomous trucking company Einride said on Wednesday it has agreed to go public in the U.S. through a merger with blank-check firm Legato Merger Corp III in a deal valuing the company at $1.8 billion.】

item.title: 美国众议院将就结束史上最长政府停摆的协议进行表决
item.description: 众议院将试图结束美国历史上持续时间最长的政府关门，就一项临时拨款方案进行投票，以重新启动中断的食品援助，支付数十万联邦工作人员的工资，并恢复陷入困境的空中交通管制系统。【原文：The House of Representatives will try to end the longest government shutdown in U.S. history, with a vote on a stopgap funding package to restart disrupted food assistance, pay hundreds of thousands of federal workers and revive a hobbled air-traffic control system.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮催生新一轮法律科技投资浪潮
item.description: 最近几周，投资者向为律师提供人工智能产品的初创公司注入了超过 7.5 亿美元的新现金，押注于争夺法律行业客户的不断增长的市场。【原文：Investors in recent weeks have injected more than $750 million in new cash into startups that make artificial intelligence products for lawyers, betting on a growing marketplace competing for legal industry customers.】

item.title: 微软扩建丹麦量子设施，建立第二个实验室
item.description: 微软公司周三表示，它正在丹麦首都哥本哈根郊外扩建其量子设施，在北欧国家建立第二个实验室，同时也是全球最大的量子基地。【原文：Microsoft on Wednesday said it is expanding its quantum facility just outside the Danish capital Copenhagen, by building its second lab in the Nordic country and its largest quantum site globally.】

item.title: 由于担心特朗普的搜捕行动，一些西班牙裔购物者转而选择安全的网上购物方式
item.description: 特朗普政府扩大移民执法范围的做法改变了一些拉美裔消费者的生活习惯，零售企业也因此受到损害。【原文：The expanded approach to immigration enforcement by the Trump administration has changed the routine for some Hispanic consumers, and retail businesses are hurting because of it.】

item.title: IBM 称 "Loon "芯片指明了到 2029 年实现实用量子计算机的道路
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（IBM）周三宣布，它已制造出一种名为 "Loon "的新型实验性量子计算芯片，这表明它向着在本十年结束前制造出有用的量子计算机的目标迈出了关键的一步。【原文：IBM announced on Wednesday it has built a new experimental quantum computing chip called Loon that demonstrates it hit a key milestone toward making useful quantum computers before the end of the decade.】

item.title: 投资者为长期增长目标欢呼，AMD 股价攀升
item.description: AMD 周三在盘前交易中股价上涨近 5%，此前一天，该公司制定了雄心勃勃的计划，希望通过从 Nvidia 手中抢占更大的人工智能市场份额，在五年内使数据中心年收入达到 1000 亿美元。【原文：AMD shares rose nearly 5% in premarket trading on Wednesday, a day after it laid out ambitious plans to reach $100 billion in annual data center revenue in five years by taking a bigger slice of the AI market from Nvidia .】

item.title: 意法半导体首席执行官奇瑞认为第一季度营收将保持平常水平
item.description: 意法半导体首席执行官让-马克-谢里（Jean-Marc Chery）表示，他预计 2026 年将从正常水平开始，并指出今年的复苏弱于预期不会导致库存调整。【原文：STMicroelectronics' Chief Executive Jean-Marc Chery said he expects 2026 to start at usual levels, noting that a weaker recovery than expected this year will not lead to inventory adjustments.】

item.title: 雪佛龙目标 2030 年前每年现金流增长 10%，同时加大成本削减力度
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周三表示，该公司计划到 2030 年将自由现金流每年增长 10%以上，并提高石油和天然气产量，同时进一步降低成本和资本支出。【原文：Chevron said on Wednesday that it plans to grow free cash flow by more than 10% annually through 2030 and increase oil and gas production, while further reducing costs and capital expenditure.】

item.title: 您在听机器人的音乐吗？调查显示人工智能音乐几乎无法察觉
item.description: 本周三，Deezer-Ipsos 的一项调查显示，97% 的听众无法区分人工智能生成的歌曲和人类创作的歌曲，这表明人们越来越担心人工智能可能会颠覆音乐的创作、消费和货币化方式。【原文：A staggering 97% of listeners cannot distinguish between artificial intelligence-generated and human-composed songs, a Deezer–Ipsos survey showed on Wednesday, underscoring growing concerns that AI could upend how music is created, consumed and monetized.】

item.title: 意大利 A2A 公司因数据中心需求将投资计划提高到 270 亿美元
item.description: 意大利综合公用事业公司 A2A 周三表示，已将 2024-2035 年的预计投资总额提高到 230 亿欧元（270 亿美元），其中 16 亿欧元专门用于创建和管理数据中心。【原文：Italian multi-utility A2A said on Wednesday it had raised its total projected investments for 2024-2035 to 23 billion euros ($27 billion), with 1.6 billion euros earmarked for creating and managing data centres.】

item.title: 美国监督机构前高级执法人员加入项目，提起有利于消费者的诉讼
item.description: 一个支持消费者的组织周三宣布，在唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）进行打压后，该局的三名前高级执法律师将启动一个 "战略执法项目"，以帮助保护公众免受企业不当行为的侵害。【原文：Three former senior enforcement lawyers at the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau are launching a "strategic enforcement project" to help protect the public from corporate misconduct following President Donald Trump's clampdown at the agency, a pro-consumer organization announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 塔吉克斯坦推出国家支持的信使应用程序
item.description: 塔吉克斯坦通信服务周二表示，该国已模仿俄罗斯和哈萨克斯坦的类似项目推出了一款全国性的信使应用程序，批评人士警告称，该应用程序可能会泄露用户数据。【原文：Tajikistan's communications service said on Tuesday that it had launched a national messenger app, mimicking similar projects in Russia and Kazakhstan, which critics have warned could compromise user data.】

item.title: 中国企业称欧盟商业环境已连续六年恶化
item.description: 周三公布的一项调查显示，在欧盟的中国企业表示，欧盟的经营状况已连续第六年恶化，劳动力成本上升和政治挑战给企业经营带来了压力。【原文：Chinese companies in the European Union say business conditions in the bloc have deteriorated for a sixth consecutive year, with rising labour costs and political challenges pressuring their operations, according to a survey published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际葡萄酒组织称，气候冲击抑制了全球葡萄酒产量
item.description: 国际葡萄与葡萄酒组织称，2025 年全球葡萄酒产量略有上升，但由于葡萄园面临极端和多变的天气，产量仍连续第三年低于平均水平。【原文：Global wine production rose slightly in 2025, but output remained below average for a third consecutive year as vineyards faced extreme and volatile weather, the International Organization of Vine and Wine said.】

item.title: 贸易解冻后，中国大豆供应过剩可能使美国出口希望落空
item.description: 在经历了数月创纪录的进口量之后，中国正在努力应对大豆供应过剩的问题，这抑制了美国的出口前景，尽管华盛顿最近达成了贸易休战协议，其中包括中国政府承诺恢复大量采购大豆。【原文：China is grappling with a glut of soybeans after months of record imports, curbing prospects for U.S. exports despite a recent trade truce that Washington said includes a pledge by Beijing to resume heavy purchases.】

item.title: 瑞银称未来五年数据中心将推动储能 "繁荣周期
item.description: 据瑞银证券（UBS Securities）称，美国由人工智能数据中心推动的电力需求增长可能会在未来五年推动储能技术的 "繁荣周期"，因为需要更多的储能技术来平滑风能和太阳能发电的波动。【原文：AI data centre-fuelled power demand growth in the U.S. is likely to drive a "boom cycle" for energy storage in the next five years as more storage is needed to smooth out fluctuations from wind and solar generation, according to UBS Securities.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司与谷歌达成俄亥俄州数据中心可再生能源协议
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周三表示，该公司已与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司达成一项为期 15 年的购电协议，将从其位于俄亥俄州的蒙彼利埃（Montpelier）太阳能发电场供应 1.5 兆瓦时的可再生能源电力。【原文：Oil major TotalEnergies has agreed a 15-year power purchase deal to supply Alphabet's Google with 1.5 terawatt hours of renewable electricity from its Montpelier solar farm in Ohio, the French company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: PayPal 时隔近两年重新登陆英国
item.description: PayPal 周三表示，在英国脱欧后重组其在英国的业务近两年后，它将重新启动在英国的在线和门店购物业务。【原文：PayPal said on Wednesday it is re-launching in the United Kingdom for customers to shop online and in stores, nearly two years after it restructured its operations there following Brexit.】

item.title: 沃达康与马斯克的星链公司签订非洲互联网协议
item.description: 南非最大的移动运营商沃达康集团（Vodacom Group）周三表示，该电信公司已与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）签署协议，为非洲各地的企业提供高速、低延迟的宽带互联网。【原文：South Africa's largest mobile operator Vodacom Group has signed an agreement with Elon Musk's Starlink to deliver high-speed, low-latency broadband internet for businesses across Africa, the telecom firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 软银股价下滑，因出售英伟达股份凸显人工智能资金需求
item.description: 软银以 58 亿美元出售其在英伟达（Nvidia）的股份，凸显出软银为支持其对 ChatGPT 创造者 OpenAI 和其他投资的 "全押 "所面临的日益增长的资金需求，软银股价周三下滑达 10%。【原文：SoftBank's shares slid as much as 10% on Wednesday after the $5.8 billion sale of its stake in Nvidia highlighted the growing funding demands it faces to bankroll its "all-in" bet on ChatGPT creator OpenAI and other investments.】

item.title: 解释：多边开发银行为何面临改革压力？
item.description: 世界银行和其他多边开发银行（MDBs）正面临压力，要求它们向遭受能源挑战和气候灾害的贫困国家提供更多帮助。以下是您需要了解的信息：【原文：The World Bank and other multilateral development banks (MDBs) are under pressure to offer more help to poor countries being hammered by energy challenges and climate disasters. Here is what you need to know:】

item.title: 英飞凌上调人工智能电源部门 2026 年销售目标，以满足蓬勃发展的需求
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌（Infineon）周三以需求强劲为由，大幅上调了其 2026 年人工智能电源部门的销售目标。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon significantly raised its 2026 sales target for the AI power supply segment on Wednesday, citing strong demand, and forecast total revenue increasing moderately from the year before despite currency headwinds.】

item.title: 台湾电子公司富士康第三季度利润增长 17%，超出预期
item.description: 由于人工智能服务器需求持续强劲，全球最大的合约电子制造商台湾富士康周三公布第三季度利润增长 17%，超过市场预期。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker, posted a 17% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, beating market forecasts, on sustained strength in demand for artificial intelligence servers.】
